entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
